name: The Monster's Meal
description:
"Don't wander in the woods at night! A monster lurks in the dark..."

A game made in 3:20 hours for Trijam #173

To play use SPACE or TOUCH / CLICK the screen.

Credits:

Art & Code: by  me Sunetraalex

Music:
Dark Ambient Loop 13 by Lucas Calvo - mundosound.com

SFX:
5 break, crunch impacts by Independent.nu

Girly Scream by Fernando Carmona

Light Machine Gun by KuraiWolf
